Smart Bristles: Develop bristles that can detect when you're not brushing your teeth properly and vibrate or change color to remind you to brush more thoroughly.
Personalized Brushing Plans: Create an app that allows users to input their dental history and create personalized brushing plans based on their specific needs.
Travel Case: Design a compact travel case that can hold the toothbrush, charger, and replacement bristles, making it easy to take on the go.
Customizable Bristle Colors: Offer a variety of interchangeable bristle colors, allowing users to express their personal style or match their toothbrush to their favorite sports team or hobby.
Built-in Timers: Incorporate built-in timers that count down the recommended brushing time, ensuring users brush for the full recommended 2 minutes.
